articles.title: PVR Inox needs the good picture to sustain beyond Sept quarter | Mint - Mint
articles.description: PVR Inox can bank on the good pipeline of Bollywood and regional movies. However, a key risk to footfalls in the December quarter is the 2023 ICC Men’s Cricket World Cup matches, which start 5 October.
